title: Gene Luen Yang, “Boxers & Saints” (First Second, 2013)
description:
I love picking up a historical monograph in which the footnotes count for a quarter or more of the total pages. Most students don’t share this strange love of mine. I’m therefore always trying to figure out ways to bring in other sorts of works that will engage students without...
